Dependencies\Code
We need to copy the following folders to this folder:

GLFW\include\GLFW\
glm\glm\
glew\include\GL\
slang\include\
Check Note below about spirv-cross
spirv_cross\ that includes:
	GLSL.std.450.h
	spirv.hpp
	spirv_cfg.hpp
	spirv_common.hpp
	spirv_cross.hpp
	spirv_cross_containers.hpp
	spirv_cross_error_handling.hpp
	spirv_cross_parsed_ir.hpp
	spirv_glsl.hpp
	spirv_parser.hpp

from spirv-cross you need to install Vulkan by LunarG* (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/sdk/home)
--------------- *Note: --------------- 
spirv-cross is surprisingly hard to find compiled. Thankfully LunarG provides compiled binaries as part of their Vulkan SDK.
it's found at <Vulkan SDK Install Folder> dependencies. Very temporary fix until CMake is done properly
--------------------------------------
<Vulkan SDK Install Folder>/Include/spirv-cross/
Copy spirv-cross folder to Dependencies/Code/
and <Vulkan SDK Install Folder>/Lib/spirv-cross/
to Dependencies/Libraries/


slang library (repository: https://github.com/shader-slang/slang)

Dependencies\Libraries
We need to copy the following files to this folder:
GLFW\lib-vc2019\glfw3.lib
glew\lib\Release\x64\glew32s.lib
slang libraries folder that contains slang.lib & gfx.lib
spirv-cross from <Vulkan SDK Install Folder>/Lib/spirv-cross/
to Dependencies/Libraries/

Dependencies\Binaries
slang folder: gfx.dll, gfx.slang, slang.dll, slang-slang, slang-glslang.dll, slang-glsl-module.dll

Properties
This is deprecated. I've included the vcxproj file that contains everything needed 
C	preprocessor -> GLEW_STATIC, SLANG_STATIC, VULKAN_HPP_NO_EXCEPTIONS
C	general -> $(SolutionDir)Dependencies\Code
Linker	general -> $(SolutionDir)Dependencies\Libraries
Linker	input -> glfw3.lib;opengl32.lib;user32.lib;gdi32.lib;shell32.lib;glew32s.lib;Winmm.lib;slang.lib;spirv-cross.lib
Build Events -> Post-Build Event -> Command Line: call "$(ProjectDir)copy_dlls.bat" "$(OutDir)"
